name: Vessels 161: DONK
description:
Thanks to a rare mutation in his left eye, Donk is an expert sniper, capable of headshotting a victim from a distance of 4km away – even if that person has a REALLY small head. Seriously, this guy could headshot a kitten. Though he probably wouldn’t. Or at least, he would charge at least 10% more than his usual fee to do so. OK, 5%.

Unfortunately Donk’s vision in his RIGHT eye is very poor, so he is almost completely useless with any gun that doesn’t have a scope, unless he keeps one eye closed the whole time. This has the side-effect of making people think he’s winking at them as he shoots them, making his victims’ final moments as confusing as they are painful.
